ygData.subject: Common ground
ygData.msgSnippet: Forgive this brief EQ-straying-away-from.... My brother appeared in a TV movie aired recently called Common Ground, it starred Johnathon Taylor Thomas.  My
ygData.messageBody:
Forgive this brief EQ-straying-away-from....

My brother appeared in a TV movie aired recently called Common Ground, it
starred Johnathon Taylor Thomas. My brother played a gay basher who
assaulted JTT who was playing a gay highschool boy. I actually got to
talk to JTT on the phone one, which I was surprised to find actually
excited me lol. I haven't actually seen Common Ground as it hasn't been
shown in Canada =/

My brother also appears in Snow Day, a movie that opened this weekend.
It's basicly a kids movie. He plays Bill, the leading man's side kick.

- Tina
